summary: The module offers a utility for configuring, starting, and supervising external subprocesses used by the NeMo framework. It handles Hydra configuration parsing, prepares the execution environment, sets up logging, and provides mechanisms to monitor and terminate the launched processes.
business_intent: To simplify and standardize the execution of external tools and scripts required by NeMo pipelines, ensuring consistent configuration, proper logging, and reliable process lifecycle management across different environments.
